description: This file declares interfaces related to warning reporting control within the WPEFramework project, including warning event handling and reporting unit management.

classes.name: IWarningEvent
classes.description: An interface representing a warning event, including methods for serialization, category retrieval, string conversion, and warning indication.

classes.name: IWarningReportingUnit
classes.description: An interface for a warning reporting unit that can report events, fetch category information, and manage warning reporting controls.

classes.name: IWarningReportingUnit::IWarningReportingControl
classes.description: A nested interface representing control over warning categories, including exclusion and configuration capabilities.

methods.name: Exclude
methods.description: Exclude a specified category or entity from warning reporting.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Configure warning reporting settings based on provided settings string.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Create a copy of the warning reporting control object.

methods.name: ReportWarningEvent
methods.description: Report a warning event with a specific identifier and event information.

methods.name: FetchCategoryInformation
methods.description: Retrieve whether a category is default, enabled, and its excluded and configuration details.

methods.name: AddToCategoryList
methods.description: Add a warning reporting control to the category list.

methods.name: RemoveFromCategoryList
methods.description: Remove a warning reporting control from the category list.
